en.name: Many Oaths of Dawn and Dusk

upgrade.0: Increases ATK by 20%. When characters in your party obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 18%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
upgrade.1: Increases ATK by 25%. When characters in your party obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 22.5%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
upgrade.2: Increases ATK by 30%. When characters in your party obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 27%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
upgrade.3: Increases ATK by 35%. When characters in your party obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 31.5%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
upgrade.4: Increases ATK by 40%. When characters in your party obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 36%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.

upgrade.0: 攻击力提升20%；队伍中的角色获取结晶反应产生的晶片时，会为装备者赋予1枚「约印」，使元素战技造成的伤害提升18%，约印持续15秒，至多同时持有2枚。所有约印将在装备者的元素战技造成伤害后的0.2秒后移除。
upgrade.1: 攻击力提升25%；队伍中的角色获取结晶反应产生的晶片时，会为装备者赋予1枚「约印」，使元素战技造成的伤害提升22.5%，约印持续15秒，至多同时持有2枚。所有约印将在装备者的元素战技造成伤害后的0.2秒后移除。

upgrade.3: 攻击力提升35%；队伍中的角色获取结晶反应产生的晶片时，会为装备者赋予1枚「约印」，使元素战技造成的伤害提升31.5%，约印持续15秒，至多同时持有2枚。所有约印将在装备者的元素战技造成伤害后的0.2秒后移除。
upgrade.4: 攻击力提升40%；队伍中的角色获取结晶反应产生的晶片时，会为装备者赋予1枚「约印」，使元素战技造成的伤害提升36%，约印持续15秒，至多同时持有2枚。所有约印将在装备者的元素战技造成伤害后的0.2秒后移除。

upgrade.0: 攻撃力+20%。チームにいるキャラクターが、結晶反応による結晶の欠片を獲得した時、装備者は「契印」を1枚獲得し、元素スキルのダメージ+18%。「契印」の継続時間は15秒、最大2枚まで。すべての「契印」は、装備者の元素スキルがダメージを与えた0.2秒後にクリアされる。
